bookAuthors: Robert Musil, Burton Pike, Sophie Wilkins
Plot: Set in Vienna on the eve of World War I, this great novel of ideas tells the story of Ulrich, ex-soldier and scientist, seducer and skeptic, who finds himself drafted into the grandiose plans for the 70th jubilee of the Emperor Franz Josef. This new translation - published in two elegant volumes - is the first to present Musil's complete text, including material that remained unpublished during his lifetime.
Characters: Ulrich, Franz Joseph I of Austria, Dr. Paul Arnheim
